title: Rupert Murdoch apologizes for 'real black President' tweet
text: Rupert Murdoch apologizes for 'real black President' tweet Thursday, 8 October 2015 (47 seconds ago) The founder of the global News Corp. media empire, Rupert Murdoch , issued an apology Thursday after he faced social media backlash following his suggestion that President Barack Obama isn't a "real black President." Rupert Murdoch Raises Eyebrows With Ben Carson â€˜Real Black President' Tweet 00:50 Rupert Murdoch has not been shy about expressing his enthusiasm for GOP presidential hopeful Ben Carson in recent weeks. But on Wednesday night the 21st Century Fox/News Corp. mogul raised eyebrows with a Twitter message regarding Carson that seemed to take a racially charged swipe at President... Recent related news Rupert Murdoch Apologizes for 'Real Black President' Tweet Fox News founder Rupert Murdoch apologizes for 'real black President' tweet
